survey_name: Digital Wallet Usage and Satisfaction Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback on customer satisfaction and usage patterns of digital wallet services to improve user experience and feature offerings.

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital wallet services do you currently use? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture any services not listed. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly for easy selection.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format to allow multiple selections. Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital wallet services do you currently use? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How often do you use a digital wallet for transactions?
questions.client_notes: Use a clear frequency scale to gauge usage patterns. Avoid overly complex scales to ensure readability.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format.

script.question_text: How often do you use a digital wallet for transactions?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in a digital wallet service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Limit selections to 3 to prioritize top features. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox format with a limit of 3 selections. Include an open-text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in a digital wallet service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your preferred digital wallet service?
questions.client_notes: This open-ended question allows for detailed feedback. Keep the text box large enough for comprehensive responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Use an open-text field for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you like to see in your preferred digital wallet service?

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your primary digital wallet service? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
questions.client_notes: Use a standard Likert scale for consistency. Ensure the scale is clearly labeled to avoid confusion.
questions.scripter_notes: Use a single-choice radio button format with a 5-point scale.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, how satisfied are you with your primary digital wallet service? (1 = Very Dissatisfied, 5 = Very Satisfied)
